00045 class uvm_callback
00046 {
00047     friend class uvm_callback_agent;
00048 
00049 protected:
00050     // Constructor: uvm_callback
00051     uvm_callback ( int priority ) :
00052         _priority ( priority ) { };  
00053 
00054     // Desstructor: uvm_callback
00055     virtual ~uvm_callback ( ) { };    
00056 
00057     // Function: call
00058     virtual void call ( ) = 0;
00059 
00060 public:
00061     // Function: priority
00062     // Returns:
00063     //  Priority needed for sorting
00064     unsigned int priority ( ) const { return _priority; }                
00065 
00066 protected:
00067     unsigned int _priority; 
00068 };

00070 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 // Class: function_callback
00072 //   Template class used for attaching prioritized callback function pointers 
00073 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 template <typename t_return, 
00080               typename t_arg1> 
00081 class function_callback : public uvm_callback
00082 {
00083 friend class uvm_callback_agent;
00084 protected:
00085     // Constructor: function_callback
00086     // Parameters:
00087     //  p_return - function callback return value
00088     //  p_func   - function pointer to callback function
00089     //  arg1     - argument of callback function
00090     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00091     function_callback ( t_return* p_return , t_return (*p_func)(t_arg1) , t_arg1 arg1 , unsigned int priority = 0 ):
00092         uvm_callback(priority),
00093         _p_return(p_return),
00094         _p_func(p_func),
00095         _arg1(arg1) 
00096     { }; 
00097 
00098     // Destructor: function_callback
00099     virtual ~function_callback ( ) { };
00100 
00101     // Function: call
00102     //  Call function callback.
00103     void call ( ) 
00104     { 
00105         if ( _p_return ) 
00106             *_p_return = (* _p_func) ( _arg1 ); 
00107         else 
00108             (* _p_func) ( _arg1 ); 
00109     }
00110 protected:
00111     t_return* _p_return; 
00112     t_return (*_p_func)(t_arg1); 
00113     t_arg1   _arg1; 
00114 };

00150         (* mp_func) ( _arg1 );

00159 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 // Class: method_callback
00161 //  class used for attaching prioritized callback methods 
00162 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 template <typename t_return, 
00169               class    t_class,
00170               typename t_arg1 >
00171 class method_callback : public uvm_callback
00172 {
00173     friend class uvm_callback_agent;
00174 
00175 protected:
00176     // Constructor: method_callback
00177     // Parameters:
00178     //  p_return - function callback return value
00179     //  t_class  - class instance of the method
00180     //  p_method - class method pointer to callback method
00181     //  arg1     - argument of callback function
00182     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00183     method_callback ( t_return * p_return , t_class * p_class, t_return (t_class::*p_method)(t_arg1), t_arg1 arg1 , int priority = 0 ) :
00184         uvm_callback(priority),
00185         mp_return(p_return),
00186         mp_class(p_class),
00187         mp_method(p_method),
00188         _arg1(arg1)
00189     { }; 
00190     
00191     // Destructor: method_callback
00192     virtual ~method_callback ( ) { }; 
00193 
00194     // Function: call
00195     //  Call function callback.
00196     void call ( ) 
00197     { 
00198         if ( mp_return ) 
00199         {
00200             * mp_return = ((*mp_class).*(mp_method))( _arg1 ); 
00201         } 
00202         else 
00203         {
00204             ((*mp_class).*(mp_method))( _arg1 ); 
00205         }
00206     }
00207 protected:
00208     t_return* mp_return; 
00209     t_class*  mp_class;
00210     t_return  (t_class::*mp_method) ( t_arg1 );
00211     t_arg1    _arg1;
00212 };

00259 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260 // Class: void_method_callback
00261 //  Maintains prioritized list of Event and Method uvm_callbacks, when derived 
00262 //  from profiles template callback API
00263 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270 class  uvm_callback_agent
00271 {
00272 public:
00273 
00274     // Constructor: uvm_callback_agent
00275     uvm_callback_agent  ( ) :
00276         _p_callbacks(0) { };
00277 
00278     // Destructor: uvm_callback_agent
00279     ~uvm_callback_agent () 
00280     {
00281         if ( _p_callbacks ) 
00282         {
00283             uvm_callback_ptr_vector::iterator it     = _p_callbacks->begin();
00284             uvm_callback_ptr_vector::iterator end_it = _p_callbacks->end(); 
00285 
00286             for (; it != end_it; it++ ) 
00287             {
00288                 delete *it; 
00289             }
00290             delete _p_callbacks; 
00291         }
00292     }
00293   
00294     // Function: call
00295     // Execute each call back in order of priority
00296     void call ( ) 
00297     {
00298         if ( _p_callbacks) 
00299         {
00300             for_each ( _p_callbacks->begin(), 
00301                        _p_callbacks->end(),
00302                     std::mem_fun ( &uvm_callback::call ) );  
00303         }
00304     }; 
00305 
00306     /*
00307     // Function: call
00308     // Execute each call back in order of priority
00309     void call_thread ( ) 
00310     {
00311         if ( _p_callbacks) 
00312         {
00313             for_each ( _p_callbacks->begin(), 
00314                        _p_callbacks->end(),
00315                     sc_spawn(sc_bind( &uvm_callback::call, this, "call" ) ) );  
00316         }
00317     }; 
00318     */
00319 
00320 
00321     // Function: register_function_callback
00322     //  Register a Function with Lowest Priority
00323     //
00324     // Parameters:
00325     //  p_func   - function pointer to callback function
00326     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00327     template <typename t_return,
00328               typename t_arg1 > 
00329     uvm_callback * register_function_callback ( t_return *p_return , t_return (*p_func)(t_arg1) , t_arg1 arg1 , int priority = 0 ) 
00330      {
00331          if ( _p_callbacks == 0 )  
00332              _p_callbacks = new uvm_callback_ptr_vector ( 0 ); 
00333 
00334          uvm_callback* reg_cb = new function_callback <t_return,t_arg1> ( p_return, p_func, arg1, priority );
00335 
00336          _p_callbacks->push_back (reg_cb);
00337 
00338          uvm_callback_by_priority callback_sorter;
00339 
00340          sort ( _p_callbacks->begin(),
00341                  _p_callbacks->end(),
00342                  callback_sorter );
00343 
00344          return reg_cb;
00345      }
00346   
00347     // Function: register_void_function_callback
00348     //  Register a void Function with Lowest Priority
00349     //
00350     // Parameters:
00351     //  p_func   - function pointer to callback function
00352     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00353     template < typename t_arg1 > 
00354     uvm_callback * register_void_function_callback ( void (*p_func)(t_arg1), t_arg1 arg1 , int priority = 0 ) 
00355     {
00356         if ( _p_callbacks == 0 ) 
00357             _p_callbacks = new uvm_callback_ptr_vector ( 0 ); 
00358 
00359         uvm_callback* reg_cb = new void_function_callback <t_arg1> ( p_func, arg1, priority );
00360 
00361         _p_callbacks->push_back(reg_cb);
00362 
00363         uvm_callback_by_priority callback_sorter;
00364 
00365         sort ( _p_callbacks->begin(),
00366                 _p_callbacks->end(),
00367                 callback_sorter );
00368 
00369         return reg_cb;
00370     }
00371   
00372     // Function: register_void_method_callback
00373     //  Register a member function with Lowest Priority
00374     //
00375     // Parameters:
00376     //  t_class  - class instance of the method
00377     //  p_method - class method pointer to callback method
00378     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00379     template <typename t_return,
00380               class t_class,
00381               typename t_arg1 > 
00382     uvm_callback * register_method_callback ( t_return * p_return , t_class * p_class, t_return (t_class::*p_method)(t_arg1), t_arg1 arg1 , int priority = 0 ) 
00383     {
00384         if ( _p_callbacks == 0 ) 
00385             _p_callbacks = new uvm_callback_ptr_vector ( 0 );
00386 
00387         uvm_callback* meth_cb = new method_callback <t_return,t_class,t_arg1> ( p_return, p_class, p_method, arg1, priority ); 
00388 
00389         _p_callbacks->push_back ( meth_cb );
00390 
00391         uvm_callback_by_priority callback_sorter;
00392 
00393         sort ( _p_callbacks->begin(),
00394                 _p_callbacks->end(),
00395                 callback_sorter );
00396 
00397         return meth_cb;
00398     }
00399 
00400     // Function: register_void_method_callback
00401     //  Register a void member function with Lowest Priority
00402     //
00403     // Parameters:
00404     //  t_class  - class instance of the method
00405     //  p_method - class method pointer to callback method
00406     //  priority - priority of callback (0 - lowest priority)
00407     //  type     - callback to register to (raise, drop, all drop)
00408     template <typename t_class,
00409               typename t_arg1 > 
00410     uvm_callback * register_void_method_callback (t_class * p_class, void (t_class::*p_method)(t_arg1), t_arg1 arg1 , int priority = 0 ) 
00411     {
00412         if ( _p_callbacks == 0 ) 
00413             _p_callbacks = new uvm_callback_ptr_vector ( 0 );
00414 
00415         uvm_callback * vmeth_cb = new void_method_callback <t_class,t_arg1> ( p_class, p_method, arg1, priority );
00416 
00417         _p_callbacks->push_back ( vmeth_cb );
00418 
00419         uvm_callback_by_priority callback_sorter;
00420 
00421         sort ( _p_callbacks->begin(),
00422                 _p_callbacks->end(),
00423                 callback_sorter );
00424 
00425         return vmeth_cb;
00426     }
00427 
00428     // Function: unregister
00429     //  Unregister a uvm_callback
00430     // 
00431     // Parameters:
00432     //  p_rem_callback - pointer to callback to be unregistered
00433     void unregister ( uvm_callback* p_rem_callback ) 
00434     {
00435         if ( _p_callbacks == 0 ) 
00436         {
00437             // TODO: error message
00438         }
00439         _p_callbacks->erase ( remove ( _p_callbacks->begin(), _p_callbacks->end(), p_rem_callback ) , _p_callbacks->end() ); // Remove it fromt callback list
00440         delete p_rem_callback;       // Delete it
00441     }
00442 
00443 protected:
00444 
00445     uvm_callback_ptr_vector_ptr _p_callbacks;   // Vector of pointers to uvm_callback s sorted by priority 
00446 
00447 };

00449 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00450 // Class: uvm_callback_by_priority
00451 //  Sorter operation for priority callback
00452 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458 class uvm_callback_by_priority : public std::binary_function <uvm_callback*, uvm_callback*, bool>
00459 {
00460 public:
00461     bool operator() ( const uvm_callback* & lhs_value , 
00462             const uvm_callback* & rhs_value ) {
00463         if ( lhs_value->priority() == rhs_value->priority() ) { 
00464             return ( lhs_value < rhs_value );       
00465         } 
00466         return ( lhs_value->priority() < rhs_value->priority() ); 
00467     } 
00468 };
